markdownRemark.html: Finally, Iceweasel 3 on Debian GNU / kFreeBSD is working! This is very awesome, I'll finally get to start regularly using Debian GNU / kFreeBSD. I've pretty much been tinkering up until now, just running updates about once a week and testing the system out.

frontmatter.title: Iceweasel 3 Granparadiso on Debian GNU kFreeBSD
